questions.question: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

answers.answer: I read a lot of books. And in my view, the best book, I've ever read, it's "D. ", writting by Robert Harris.
The story is inspired by a real fact. This story talks about Alfred Dreyfus affair but from the point of view of Picard.
Picard is colonel in the french army, he discovered that Dreyfus is not guilty. And the reader can follow the investigation and the release of Dreyfus.
Picard is an interesting character and an original point of view. Because you had a different look on the affair and on Dreyfus.
This story is wonderfull and very exciting. The style of harris is awesome and the book is very easy to read because it's a master piece.
Thank you for reading my review.
